typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		emp_id as string,
		emp_name as string,
		emp_surname as string,
		emp_designation_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> source1
source1 filter(emp_id=='1') ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(column1 = emp_name||emp_surname) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		emp_id as string,
		emp_name as string,
		emp_surname as string,
		emp_designation_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['outputfile.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
